title: SOLD: 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Albert Spalding HOF (BGS Authentic)

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Albert Spalding HOF (BGS Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very scarce 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing HOF'er, Albert Spalding and having been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the item for condition details as it is in pristine condition. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
